Posts.Content: hatblondie wrote: Hi, I was diagnosed for the first time Aug 97 with bc in right breast. After mastectomy I took  Temoxifen for 5 years. Five years from first mastectomy I had my left brease removed because of family history. Very strong family history. I was clear for 6 weeks short of 11 years when I found a large lump under left arm. Its in lymphatic system under both arms, sternum, ribs and small spot on lung. My tumor markers were 238 before starting treatment. I will have another one this Thursday. I took 12 weeks of Taxol and Herceptin and I am now on Femara for 2 weeks. Im not sure why my Dr took me off Herceptin after only 12 weeks. Has anyone else had so few treatments of Herceptin?
